Clip.Title: REAL STORY; THE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Get the real story behind some of the silver screen's most iconic films and characters.

Clip.Title: FREUD'S NAKED TRUTHS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Go behind-the-scenes of artist Lucian Freud , grandson of Sigmund and see rare footage of him in his studio, where supermodels, gangsters, and British nobility sat for his portraits.

Clip.Title: L.A. FROCK STARS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Vintage clothing store owner Doris Raymond is always on the lookout for the "Holy Grail"; the iconic piece that has been touched by one of the world's greatest designers. During a trip to an expo show in Dallas, she learns of such a garment, found discarded at the bottom of a closet

Clip.Title: L.A. FROCK STARS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The history of 20th-century America is on display at Doris Raymond's vintage clothing boutique, The Way We Wore(R). Decades of high fashion from iconic designers fill the racks of this boutique, each telling a story about society at the time.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: High above the Gulf of St. Lawrence, one of the East Coast's hidden wonders lies below - the Magdalene Islands - offering some of the region's top beaches, grassy hillsides and spectacular cliff faces.

Clip.Title: THE HISTORY OF THE FUTURE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Inquire as to whether the idea of a perfect society is, indeed, possible.

Clip.Title: CANADA 1812: FORGED IN FIRE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: An east coast shipper creates a private naval fleet to seize American ships.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The Eastern Coastline of Nova Scotia is a living historical record of the centuries-old battle between the French and the English in the New World, along one of the Atlantic's most remote, hostile coastlines.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: High above the Gulf of St. Lawrence, one of the East Coast's hidden wonders lies below - the Magdalene Islands - offering some of the region's top beaches, grassy hillsides and spectacular cliff faces.

Clip.Title: REAL STORY; THE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Get the real story behind some of the silver screen's most iconic films and characters.

Clip.Title: FREUD'S NAKED TRUTHS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Go behind-the-scenes of artist Lucian Freud , grandson of Sigmund and see rare footage of him in his studio, where supermodels, gangsters, and British nobility sat for his portraits.

Clip.Title: DENYING THE MOON LANDING
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Apollo astronauts and scientific experts reflect on NASA's glorious achievement, and the shock of having their accomplishments questioned 40 years later.

Clip.Title: AMERICA IN SPACE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Explore NASA's development from its founding in 1958 to its preparation for a moon landing in stunning HD.

Clip.Title: DOOMSDAY IN TUNGUSKA
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Join the ongoing investigation over what caused one of the biggest explosions in history in June 1908, Siberia.

Clip.Title: I HAVE SEEN THE EARTH CHANGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: In the remote regions of North Quebec, the Inuit people are among the first on Earth to suffer from Climate Change.

Clip.Title: I HAVE SEEN THE EARTH CHANGE
Clip.Episode: Mongolia: A Country Swept By Winds
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The Matriarch of a large Mongolian family of Nomads investigates and reflects on how the rapid changes in weather are impacting her country.

Clip.Title: THE BIONIC VET
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The Bionic Vet and his staff must save a tiny chinchilla that has broken both of his arms and a Labrador puppy that needs a bionic appendage that exactly mirrors his diseased bone to save his life.

Clip.Title: UNDERSEA EDENS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Off the eastern coast of Australia lies the Great Barrier Reef - a natural structure so large it stretches for over 1,200 miles and can be seen from outer space. This 6,000 year old underwater empire has been built from as many as 400 different species of coral, and holds some of the world's most iconic animals like clownfish, green sea turtles and barracudas.

Clip.Title: VENOM ISLANDS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: On a string of Southern Indonesian islands, poisonous predators lurk, each with its own toxic cocktail suited to its hunting style. Some bite. Some sting. Some strike quickly, while others deliver their own slow brand of death.

Clip.Title: ELEPHANT KING
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Mayhem is about to break out in Namibia's Etosha National Park. This sprawling, arid land plays host to the highest concentration of elephants on Earth, and they've recently lost their leader. The quest to become the new elephant king is on, and the candidates are all six-ton giants, willing to throw their weight around.

Clip.Title: THE BIONIC VET
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The Bionic Vet and his staff must save a tiny chinchilla that has broken both of his arms and a Labrador puppy that needs a bionic appendage that exactly mirrors his diseased bone to save his life.

Clip.Title: UNDERSEA EDENS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Off the eastern coast of Australia lies the Great Barrier Reef - a natural structure so large it stretches for over 1,200 miles and can be seen from outer space. This 6,000 year old underwater empire has been built from as many as 400 different species of coral, and holds some of the world's most iconic animals like clownfish, green sea turtles and barracudas.
